name: Lowramp
tagline: Low Rank matrix Factorization with AMP
body:
### Welcome to Low RAMP
Low RAMP is a MATLAB Low rank matrix factorization solver based on Belief-Propagation, following the equations in http://arxiv.org/abs/1503.00338 (ISIT 2015) and http://arxiv.org/abs/1507.03857

Comments and remarks regarding bugs or functionalities are more than welcome.

### Authors and Contributors
Florent Krzakala (@krzakala), Lenka Zdeborova (@zdeborova) and Thibault Lesieur.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Send a mail to florent krzakala  at florent.krzakala@gmail.com
